thread.title: Classic Recipe: Steak au Poivre With Roast Potatoes

author: Kitty Greenwald
title: Classic Recipe: Steak au Poivre With Roast Potatoes
text:
“IT’S THE HEIGHT of French cuisine,” said Lee Hanson of this steak au poivre, the sort of classic, crowd-pleasing fare he and co-chef Riad Nasr will offer at their all-day brasserie, Frenchette, opening in a few weeks in Manhattan’s Tribeca.
Peppercorn-crusted filet mignon in a cream sauce comes with a side of buttery roast potatoes.
